description: The file defines the AddEditNoteViewModel class, which manages the state and logic for adding, editing, and deleting notes in a note-taking application. It interacts with a repository to perform data operations and exposes LiveData for UI updates.

classes.name: AddEditNoteViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel responsible for handling note addition, editing, retrieval, and deletion. It communicates with the SupabaseRepository to perform data operations and exposes LiveData to observe the state and data of notes.

methods.name: loadNote
methods.description: Loads a note by its ID; if ID is null or empty, it clears the current note.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Saves a new note or updates an existing one. It handles posting updates to LiveData and invoking the callback upon completion.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID and updates the LiveData accordingly.
